```{r}
library(FLGP)
library(kernlab)
library(ggplot2)
library(latex2exp)
```

+ spiral case

```{r}
set.seed(1234)
```


```{r}
n = 2000
theta = runif(n,0,8*pi)
X = cbind((theta+4)^(0.7)*cos(theta), (theta+4)^(0.7)*sin(theta))
Y = 3*sin(theta/10) + 3*cos(theta/2) + 4*sin(4*theta/5)
```


```{r,include=FALSE}
ggplot() + geom_point(aes(X[,1],X[,2]),size=0.5) +
  xlab(TeX("$X_1$")) + ylab(TeX("$X_2$"))
ggsave("plots/spiral/allpoints.pdf")
```

```{r}
s = 200
I = subsample_cpp(X, s)
```

```{r,include=FALSE}
ggplot() + geom_point(aes(I[,1],I[,2]),size=0.5) +
  xlab(TeX("$X_1$")) + ylab(TeX("$X_2$"))
ggsave("plots/spiral/subsamplepoints.pdf")
```

```{r}
ggplot() + geom_point(aes(X[,1],X[,2],color=Y)) +
  scale_color_gradientn(colours = rainbow(10))
```


```{r}
m = 500
train.index = sample.int(n,m); test.index = c(1:n)[-train.index]
X.train = X[train.index,]; Y.train = Y[train.index]
X.test = X[test.index,]; Y.test = Y[test.index]
Yobs.train = Y.train + rnorm(m,0,1)
```

```{r}
sqrt(sum((Y.test-mean(Yobs.train))^2)/(n-m))
```


```{r}
s = 500; r = 3; K = 100
```

+ LKFLGP

```{r}
t1 = Sys.time()
res_pred_lkflag = fit_lae_regression_gp_rcpp(X.train,Yobs.train,X.test,s,r,K)
t2 = Sys.time()
t2-t1
```

```{r}
Y_pred_lkflag = res_pred_lkflag$Y_pred
sqrt(sum((Y.train-Y_pred_lkflag$train)^2)/(n-m))
sqrt(sum((Y.test-Y_pred_lkflag$test)^2)/(n-m))
```

```{r}
ggplot() + geom_point(aes(X.test[,1],X.test[,2],color=Y_pred_lkflag$test)) +
  scale_color_gradientn(colours = rainbow(10)) +
  geom_point(aes(X.train[,1],X.train[,2]),color="black", size=0.7)
```

+ SKFLGP

```{r}
t1 = Sys.time()
res_pred_skflag = fit_se_regression_gp_rcpp(X.train,Yobs.train,X.test,s,r,K)
t2 = Sys.time()
t2 - t1
```

```{r}
Y_pred_skflag = res_pred_skflag$Y_pred
sqrt(sum((Y.test-Y_pred_skflag$test)^2)/(n-m))
```

```{r}
ggplot() + geom_point(aes(X.test[,1],X.test[,2],color=Y_pred_skflag$test)) +
  scale_color_gradientn(colours = rainbow(10)) +
  geom_point(aes(X.train[,1],X.train[,2]),color="black", size=0.7)
```

+ RBF

```{r}
t1 = Sys.time()
rbf.spiral = gausspr(X.train,Yobs.train)
Y_pred_rbf = predict(rbf.spiral, X.test)
t2 = Sys.time()
t2 - t1
sqrt(sum((Y.test-Y_pred_rbf)^2)/(n-m))
```

```{r}
ggplot() + geom_point(aes(X.test[,1],X.test[,2],color=Y_pred_rbf)) +
  scale_color_gradientn(colours = rainbow(10)) +
  geom_point(aes(X.train[,1],X.train[,2]),color="black", size=0.7)
```
